original_title: Å½ivot srpske vojske u logoru na Banjici
overview: Victors of the Balkan Wars returned in August 1913 to the army camp in Banjica field in Belgrade. Their next of kin came to visit them there after a long period of time. After family lunch, the officers took the lead in the army dance together with the soldiers, thus celebrating in friendly manner the return to the homeland.
title: Life in the Serbian Army Camp in Banjica
